title: Can not start QUEUE!

embed.description: Provides free image upload and hosting integration for forums. Free picture hosting and photo sharing for websites and blogs.

body: Cant start queue. This error pops up. What is this? anyone got this prob? how to solve it? {{champion:32}}

replies.body: whats frustrating is i all of a sudden am facing the same issue, 4 years never been a issue, yet even though riot has been flooded recently with people saying they cant login or queue in games , you guys say the same thing to everyone... that its a network problem or a connection problem on OUR side... quit bullshitting, its not our side, its yours.

When you join match making, the server needs to transition you over to the same room as everyone you're queued with.  It looks like a network problem is causing you to get left behind.  Go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your connection and get this fixed. It's important to go over every step, as consistently failing to join a match can result in a lower priority queue penalty.  Let me know if you have any questions!
